message: container "fluentbit" in Pod "ray-cluster-kuberay-head-tqsjg" does not set readOnlyRootFilesystem: true in its securityContext. This setting is encouraged because it can prevent attackers from writing malicious binaries into runnable locations in the container filesystem.
